advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
description:
Watch it, share it, follow it! 

Want to watch news, sports, entertainment and live TV shows for FREE right on your iPhone/iPad? There is an app for that! 

With SPB TV you can use a 3G, 4G or Wi-Fi internet connection to get access to more than 200 channels from 17+ countries. No sign-up, just watch and enjoy! 

«It has been incredibly popular all over the world, and it’s easy to see why – it offers a little bit of a wide-variety of programming that is good for those long waits in the doctor’s office or while on the bus to work! And best of all it’s free!» 
GearDiary 

« If you want to get lost in free streaming TV from all over the globe, this is the app for you.»
iPhoneLife Magazine 

Features: 
-A wide selection of TV channels 
-Video-on-demand channels 
-Full screen TV Player with Picture-in-Picture Mode 
-Integrated TV guide: today's full day guide, current week guide 
-Current and upcoming TV shows’ calendar notifications 
-Onscreen controls 
-Social sharing
-Network bandwidth fluctuations support
…and many others! 

Auto-renewable subscriptions are available in this application. Please note the following terms regarding this type of subscriptions: 

- Each auto-renewable subscription has it own length and price that can be found before the payment 
- Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase 
- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period 
- Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal 
- Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase 
- No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period 


Please rate the app if you like it. For support questions, feature requests, and bug reports, please email us at support@spbtv.com 

For release notes and application status, please visit: http://spbtv.com/iphone-software/tv/history.html
releaseNotes:
-discover interesting content with global program guide
-use search to find your favorite content and see what's on-air now
